description: This is a market on predicting the individual who will be confirmed as the next Secretary of Defense.

markets.description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Donald Trump appoints Person E as Secretary of Defense by June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

This market may be updated in the future to replace Person E with one of the potential candidates.

A candidate will be considered to have been appointed if they are confirmed to the position through a senate vote, appointed through a recess appointment, or are otherwise officially made the Secretary of Defense.

This market will resolve based on the first Trump candidate who is appointed to this position - if another candidate is appointed to this position first, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is information from the U.S. Government.
markets.question: Will Person E be Trump's Defense Secretary?

markets.description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Donald Trump appoints someone other than any of the named candidates as Secretary of Defense by June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If Donald trump dose not appoint a Secretary of Defense by June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes".

A candidate will be considered to have been appointed if they are confirmed to the position through a senate vote, appointed through a recess appointment, or is otherwise officially made the Secretary of Defense.

This market will resolve based on the first Trump candidate who is appointed to this position - if another is appointed to this position first, this market will immediately resolve to "No".
